segments.text: I notice the sink overflowing, water pouring down like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, completely unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she keeps going with her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the counter, dishes are neatly stacked, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, revealing the cookie jar full of goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a stool, stretching to grab some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems unsteady, legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, arm raised, expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels so everyday, yet there's this hidden tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is dripping down the cabinet doors now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so ordinary, but I wonder what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from outside highlights the details so clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR
